txt.en: It is a unique joy to watch servants of the Enemy desperately tear off their armour as they try to get out the bees that found their way underneath.
You have nearly perfected your technique of wielding bees as a weapon. You only get stung once or twice!
Master your understanding of battle and the space in which it takes place so that you can end battles more swiftly in the future.

The Champion is acutely aware of his surroundings throughout battle. This sensitivity and understanding can allow more ready access to skills when a Champion's understanding and control has reached a greater level.
